name: D-Link DWA-582 802.11a/b/g/n/ac PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Features: [Dual Band Wireless AC technology for less interference and more bandwidth, Access a secure wireless network using advanced WPA or WPA2 encryption, Easy to install and use with the D-Link Setup Wizard and Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS), 2 x 4.5dBi External Antennas, Backwards compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n devices, Increased bandwidth, reliability, and functionality over legacy PCI cards, PCI Express x1, x4, x8, or x16 support, Low Profile Bracket included]
